# Absorption measurements

Overview of the averaged absorption spectra for each area. The $a_{\text{CDOM}}$ spectra have been refitted from the original/raw spectra.

```{r}

```

Comparing $a_{\text{CDOM}}(443)$ for the different areas. There is a clear gradient pattern among the areas.

```{r}

```
